channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Sherry's blog

item.title: How to setup Storage Account trigger with Event Grid-1
item.description: Descriptions we want to build an ’app’ which can listen to a specific ‘storage account’, whenever a new file has been uploaded(we take this an event), this app will be triggered to do sth based on the event. About Event Grid Components Events - What happened, alerts,facts Event sources - Where the event took place. Event generator/publisher - e.g. Storage blob Topics - One of an endpoint where publishers send events.
